effect.diamond_pearl: Heals the user for half its max HP.
effect.platinum: Heals the user for half its max HP.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.platinum: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
